nodes.text: The Metalorn prison known as Unreal City employed a number of guards.

The guards were generally all tall, gaunt figures who towered over Metalorn's Skakoan rulers from the Techno Union. The guards wore metal armor with a blue hue and wore helmets with built in respirators. They carried electrostaffs.

When attempting to escape Metalorn during the Clone Wars, the Alderaan Senator Bail Prestor Organa and the Jedi Shaak Ti killed several of the guards while running out of Unreal City. Organa's pilot, Captain Raymus Antilles, also dispatched several guards and numerous droids with the Tantive IV, while aiding the Senator and Jedi.
